ComicInfo.Summary:
The age-old urban legend about an escaped, homicidal mental patient comes to life in Zenescope's newest twist on the popular tale. The fun and scary new series from the company that does horror best continues here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Giuseppe Cafaro, Simone Di Meo & Stephen Schaffer | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Eric J & Jeff Balke | 3 | Note: The digital edition (3/4/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
